title: Baby Carrier
description: upper section has applique scroll pattern with two squares, approx. 3\" with red, white, black on green; lower part has scroll applique in same colors surrounding black butterfly and 2 corner black dragons wide blue side borders on three sides; top border, green, black and white pattern
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
